Download Py4J
=============

You will be able to download Py4J on this page soon! In the meantime, you can checkout the code from our `subversion repository <https://sourceforge.net/projects/py4j/develop>`_.

Requirements
============

Py4J requires

* A Python interpreter. Py4J has been tested with CPython 2.6.
* Java 6.0.

If you would like a particular version to be supported, fill an `enhancement request <https://sourceforge.net/apps/trac/py4j/newticket>`_.

Installation Instructions
=========================

Instructions to come soon.
